name: Fujin
description:
FUJIN is a peaceful exploration game with mildly-reactive, wholly-atmospheric environments. The full game will feature hours worth of exploration complimented by a soundtrack of unique lofi chillstep beats you can unwind to.

Support us now to secure the full version at launch later this year as well as regular demo updates. The current demo build is a quick sample of sights and sounds for you to preview.

Music & Sound - Natalie Salmon-Plesa, Kiara Martinovic-Kellerman, Kalesh Tamil Selvam, Brenden Blanch

Art & Animation - Sophie Gower, Chiara Tallarico, Aidan Ranger, Sage Mitchell

Design - Tristan Shaw

Design, Art & Programming - Joshua Bidwell

Follow us @fujinthegame
